p.l: Use this element when showing sample output of a program.
For example, combining this with the kdb element we could have
At the prompt C:\Forrest\ to get a seed site type in forrest seed
Code for the above is : <l> At the prompt <samp>C:\Forrest\</samp> to get a seed site type in <kbd>forrest seed</kbd></l>
Also note that both samp and kbd are existing elements.

section.p: Used as a generic structural element, can be used inline perhaps to highlight a word or phrase in a different style to other elements offered. Used in conjunction with CSS , the span element can be used in an infinite amount of ways and can prevent the re-use or re-styling of other more dedicated elements (such as code, em or when they don't seem appopriate.)
